interface.name: org.allseen.LSF.ControllerService.SceneWithSceneElements
interface.description: This interface is provided by the LSF Controller Service to enable the LSF Controller Clients to create, update and lookup Scene with Scene with Scene Elements.

method.name: CreateSceneWithSceneElements
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to create a Scene with Scene Elements.

method.name: UpdateSceneWithSceneElements
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to update a Scene with Scene Elements.

method.name: GetSceneWithSceneElements
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch a Scene with Scene Elements.
